webpageTitle: Box Editor | RTS to Latin Transliteration
dimmerDropzoneHeader: Drop the image / box pair here!
settingsMenuAppAppearanceDescription: Adjust the appearance of the interface.
settingsMenuToolbarActionsDescription: Choose actions to display in the toolbar.
settingsMenuToolbarActionsCheckboxInvisi: Toggle between showing or hiding invisibles
settingsMenuToolbarActionsCheckboxDetect: Detect all lines of text visible in the image
settingsMenuToolbarActionsCheckboxIdenti: Identify all characters for all text boxes
Identify all characters for the selected text box
settingsMenuImageViewDescription: Adjust the size of the image display area.
settingsMenuEditorToolsDescription: Choose which convenience features to make available in the editor.
settingsMenuEditorToolsCheckboxCharInfoP: Show Unicode info popup for selected characters
settingsMenuEditorToolsCheckboxConfidenc: Display confidence score for text suggestions
settingsMenuOnImageLoadDescription: Perform actions when a new image is loaded.
settingsMenuOnImageLoadCheckboxIncludeTe: Include text suggestions for detected lines
settingsMenuAlertsAndWarningsDescription: Enable or surpress the following messages.
settingsMenuAlertsAndWarningsCheckboxFil: Box and image file names do not match
settingsMenuAlertsAndWarningsCheckboxCha: Leaving or loading an image without first downloading
settingsMenuWorkflowDescription: Choose what convenience features you would like to use.
settingsMenuWorkflowCheckboxAutoDownload: Auto-download box file when all lines committed
Auto-download ground truth file when all lines committed
settingsMenuKeyboardShortcutsDescription: Customize the keyboard shortcuts for frequently used actions.
messageUpcomingFeatureKeyboardShortcutsD: In a future update you will be able to add and customize the keyboard shortcuts. For now, you can usethesedefaults and swap them around.
settingsMenuRecognitionModelDescription: Choose a language to use for OCR text suggestions.
settingsMenuRTSKeyboardLayoutDescription: We've made a custom keyboard layout for macOS to allow for easier typing of Cyrillic characters.
settingsMenuTextHighlightingDescription: Highlight text in the input field based on custom regex patterns.
settingsMenuTextHighlightingUsageNote: Patterns only apply at the character level. Edit the cells under Name, Color, and Pattern columns tomodify a highlighter's properties.
settingsMenuHelpHeader: How to use the Box Editor
settingsMenuHelpDescription1: To begin, upload an image or use the provided sample. Select the buttons in the toolbar to perform certainactions such as identifying lines of text and generating suggestions.
settingsMenuHelpDescription2: Once text boxes are generated for all lines of text, you can start editing as needed. Either manually typein the box dimensions in the coordinate fields or drag the handles on the image to change the size orposition of a text box.Use the tools on the right to split boxes into columns, draw new ones, or delete existing boxes.
settingsMenuHelpDescription3: When the document is complete, download the .box file and .gt.txt files and usethem to train your OCR model.
settingsMenuHelpDescription4: The progress bar shows the progress of the tagging. When done, download the .box file andthe.gt.txt file to use in Tesseract.
settingsMenuHelpToolbarActionsDetectAllL: Detect all lines of text and draw boxes for them.
settingsMenuHelpToolbarActionsRedetectAl: Redetect text in boxes and regenerate output.
settingsMenuHelpToolbarActionsRedectedSe: Redetect text for selected box and regenerate output.
settingsMenuHelpToolbarActionsLanguageMo: Choose a language model for OCR suggestions.
settingsMenuHelpResetDescription: In case of unexpected behavior, you can reset all settings to their default values.
settingsMenuAboutDescription: This is a powerful Box Editor for Tesseract allowing for efficient generation, editing, and managing textboxes in WordStr format. The tool uses a custom trained model for authoring the Romanian TransitionalScript.
settingsMenuAboutMoreInfoNote: For info and support, please visit the following links:
settingsMenuAcknowledgementDescription: This work was supported by a grant from the Romanian Ministry of Research, Innovation andDigitization, CCCDI -UEFISCDI, project number PN-III-P2-2.1-PED-2021-0693, within PNCDI III.
